page.title: 06RELIGION
page.content: The only religious meeting house in our area is St. Mary's church,Albury. The building dates from medieval times, the chancel being 13th century, the nave,14th century.It has a 15th century tower with 6 bells.The church also has a 15th century rood screen, and a pulpit inlayed with shields. There is a defaced tomb in one of the aisles to Sir Walter de la Lee.There are 3 brasses in various parts of the church. When questioned{70%}of the people asked said that they attended church, {30%}said that they did not. { 50%}said they thought that church still played a part in community life, {50%}said they thought it did not.
